entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port-sharing configuration - mechanism/UX #39642
  • Determine configuration options needed for port-sharing #39641
  • Port sharing using Kestrel+YARP #39640
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .Net 6.0.1 Blazor Wasm - Cannot move or rename MainLayout.razor #39638
  • Confusion using FileExtensionContentTypeProvider Class #39635
  • API1000 analyser should respect custom subclassed attributes #39632
  • DataAnnotation ignored on Record for validation #39631
  • SignalR C# Client StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected #39626
  • [Blazor] Feature Request for .NET 7 - Enhanced Lazy Loading #39622

Closed

  • dotnet-sdk-3.1.406-win-x64 failed to install, always #30484
  • Investigate CA1844 warnings about performance in stream #39555
    7.0-preview1
  • Adding EntryAssembly to AddRazorPages/AddControllers* #39126
    7.0-preview1
  • Blazor is breaking build. We do not use Blazor. How to get rid of it. #39526
    6.0.x
  • Perf regression: https #39611
  • Perf regression: fortunes #39624
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR Authentication Attributes - incorrect documentation #39590
  • Razor runtime view compilation via environment variable not working in .NET 6 #38465
    7.0-preview1
  • Virtualize scrolling is broken when using display:grid on panel and display:content on rows #38439
    Discussions
  • Razor Pages ComplexTypeModelBinder fails to handle the suggestion of "Alternatively, set the 'X' property to a non-null value in the 'YModel' constructor" #21916
    7.0-preview1
  • Add support for Blazor Component Extension like C# code extension for reusable components #39494
  • Blazor Wasm server hosted get path conflict error on build solution #39627
  • Visual support in visual studio for organizing razor code #39630
  • JsonSerializerContext not called for some api endpoints #39628
  • Blazor's AuthorizeRouteView should allow for setting a different layout on the NotAuthorized content #39456
    Backlog
  • Problem building this repo #39440
  • Unable to render script inside blazor component #39557
  • Blazor Server app not find static file when changing environment from Development #39596
  • Blazor Server Kestrel keep-alive client-server communication after disconnect #39615

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39639
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • Declare readonly members for mutable structs #39637
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Make H3StaticTable.Get return ref readonly #39636
    area-runtime
  • Fix typo in localization file #39633
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Always build App.Ref and the targeting packs #39620
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix VS only warning #39614
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable CA1844 #39634
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Adding warning log when no actions detected #39618
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.14.1 to 1.14.7 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39490
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview1
  • Always build App.Ref and the targeting packs #39568
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39381
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid logging unsupported alternative for complex type binding #39353
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • !nits! Clean up App.Ref, App.Runtime slightly #39565
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Added IServiceProvider to DataAnnotationsValidator #39445
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Update to SDK 7.0.100-alpha.1.22068.3 #39617
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix flakey HTTP/2 tests #39588
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Remove Interop build step #39553
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc
  • Changing from Path to ModelBinding when inferred API parameters #39607
    area-mvc
  • Update Mvc to use LoggerMessageAttribute #38658
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add support for annotating required elements in collection #39367
    area-mvc
  • Add ConfigureHttpJsonOptions for M.A.Htt.Json.JsonOptions #39502
    area-runtime
  • Mechanism for providing validation CSS class names through DI #34777
    area-mvc, community-contribution
